item.title: Rotting food dumped, 12th September

item.title: Damage to speed bumps 341 Kilburn Ln, 12th September
item.description:
To reiterate the speed bumps on the road are severely damaged and have the potential to cause an accident either directly or due to damage to vehicles travelling over them. This has been selected on a map so not sure why you need a house number but 341 Kilburn Ln, London W9 3EG.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crimscott street, 12th September
item.description:
There is litter everywhere on the street but in particular outside the social care centre with bins always overflowing onto pavement. The street requires more frequent cleaning given increase number of residents living on the street and the social resident home at the end of the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crimscott Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste, 12th September
item.description:
Food waste being continually dumped over the pavements. Mainly take away containers containing food. This is encouraging rats and mice. The food often blocks the pavement next to the primary school causing children to walk into the road to avoid stepping on the mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lime Kiln Drive, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hilldrop Road, Holloway, London

item.title: Street lighting out for 12 months, 12th September
item.description:
Both the street lights on Puddle Dock haven't worked for 12 months There are two sharp corners in the cycle lane - which makes street lighting even more important Please finally get this fixed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Puddle Dock, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Front door glass broken and door is stiff, 12th September
item.description:
The entrance to the block for houses 41-48 has broken glass and the door is extremely stiff when pulling to open. Often the bell has to be rung twice for the door to open and still extreme force is needed for it to pry.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33-48, Lympstone Gardens, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
